name: knowledge-point
description: AI agent for analyzing files with zero data retention

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run vite" "npm run electron-dev" "npm run build:main"
scripts.build:main: npm run build:preload && tsc src/main/index.ts src/main/file-system.ts src/main/utils.ts --outDir dist/main --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --watch
scripts.build:preload: tsc src/main/preload.ts --outDir dist/main --module commonjs --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports
scripts.build: vite build && tsc src/main/*.ts --outDir dist/main --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node && electron-builder
